General.Name: Nan Liu Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Nan Liu Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells household goods in Taiwan. It offers air-through and thermal bonded fabrics for top layer and sub-layer diapers and female napkins, etc.; spunlace nonwoven fabrics used in wet wipes for restaurants, disposable washcloth for hotels, towels and clean wipes, household wipes, facemask fabrics, soft wipes etc.; and high-tech woodpulp spunlace fabrics for surgical gowns, medical drapes, medical isolation gowns, and for base fabrics of medical creams, and high-tech low-lint industrial wipes. The company also provides biotech materials, facial masks, tightening toners, essences, and wet wipes. It also exports its products to Japan, the United States, Southeast Asia, etc. Nan Liu Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

1.Name: Mr. Cheng Hsu  Chang
1.Title: Accounting Mang., Accounting Officer, Financial Officer & Corp. Governance Officer
